class.name: RelatedFeatureEntity
class.comment: Table to store related feature information used in the OGC SOS 2.0 Capabilities (See also OGC SWES 2.0). Mapping file: mapping/transactionl/RelatedFeature.hbm.xml

column.name: id
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: featureOfInterest
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related feature. Contains "featureOfInterest".featureOfInterestid

set.name: relatedFeatureRoles
set.comment: Relation table to store relatedFeatures and their associated relatedFeatureRoles. Mapping file: mapping/transactionl/RelatedFeature.hbm.xml

column.name: relatedFeature
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related relatedFeature. Contains "relatedFeature".relatedFeatureid

column.name: relatedFeatureRole
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related relatedFeatureRole. Contains "relatedFeatureRole".relatedFeatureRoleid

set.name: offerings
set.comment: Relation table to store relatedFeatures and their associated offerings. Mapping file: mapping/transactionl/RelatedFeature.hbm.xml

column.name: relatedFeature
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related relatedFeature. Contains "relatedFeature".relatedFeatureid

column.name: offering
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".offeringid
